Trigger.name: (.+) your {@bodypart}.
Trigger.script:
local damagetype={"bites", "blasts", "cleaves", "crushes", "hacks", "hits", "lances", "pierces", "pounds", "scythes", "shoots", "slashes", "slices", "smites", "stabs", "stings", "strikes", "whips"}
if table.contains(damagetype,matches[3]) then selectCaptureGroup(1) fg("red") resetFormat() end

Trigger.name: You (.+) hard\.
Trigger.script:
local damagetype={"bites", "blasts", "cleaves", "crushes", "hacks", "hits", "lances", "pierces", "pounds", "scythes", "shoots", "slashes", "slices", "smites", "stabs", "stings", "strikes", "whips"}
if table.contains(damagetype,matches[2]) then selectCaptureGroup(1) fg("green") resetFormat() end

Trigger.name: You (\S+) (.+) {@bodypart}.
Trigger.script:
local damagetype={"bite", "blast", "cleave", "crush", "hack", "hit", "lance", "pierce", "pound", "scythe", "shoot", "slash", "slice", "smite", "stab", "sting", "strike", "whip"}
if table.contains(damagetype,matches[2]) then selectCaptureGroup(1) fg("green") resetFormat() end

Trigger.name: Ooops. Your clumsy execution broadcasts your intentions.
